# GlossÃ¡rio {.unnumbered}

```{r}
#| label: glossary
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| dev: "ragg_png"

yaml::read_yaml(file = "./glossary.yml") |>
  tibble::as_tibble() |>
  tidyr::pivot_longer(
    dplyr::everything(),
    names_to = "term",
    values_to = "definition"
  ) |>
  dplyr::mutate(
    letter = stringr::str_sub(term, start = 1, end = 1)
  ) |>
  dplyr::arrange(letter) |>
  gt::gt(groupname_col = "letter") |>
  gt::tab_options(
    table.font.size = 14,
    column_labels.hidden = TRUE,
    quarto.disable_processing = TRUE
  ) |>
  gt::tab_style(
    style = list(
      gt::cell_text(weight = "bold", size = gt::px(24)),
      gt::cell_borders(sides = "bottom", color = NULL)
    ),
    locations = gt::cells_row_groups()
  ) |>
  gt::opt_stylize(
    style = 1,
    color = "gray"
  )

```
